I am a craft beer enthusiast who holds the Cicerone Certified Beer Server certification. Crafted beer & Co. at Maji Square in Yuan Shan Flower Expo is one of the craft beer bar/shop that I often visit.

They offer a wide variety of craft beers, and the owner and staff are not only friendly but also very professional. Their expertise is strongly reflected in their taste in selecting craft beers. In addition to the usual domestic and foreign craft beers, they also occasionally have top-notch products from renowned foreign breweries.

In terms of pricing, I think it's reasonable for the market. Of course, if compared with beers sold in convenience stores, I think it's a different category.

And if you purchase beer to takw away, there's also a discount for quantity, which is one of the reasons why I regularly come here to replenish my fridge.

I am a craft beer enthusiast certified by Cicerone Certify Beer Server. CraFTED Beer & Co. in Yuanshan Flower Expo Maji Square is one of the craft beer restaurants I often visit.
There are many types of craft beer here. The owners and service staff are not only kind, but also very professional.
Their professional is strongly reflected in the taste of choosing craft beer.Therefore, in addition to the common domestic and foreign craft beer in the store, there are also top works of well -known foreign wineries from time to time.

In terms of price, in terms of the Taiwan market, I personally think it is reasonable.Of course, if you want to compare with beer sold in the supermarket, I think this is a different category.And if you buy a canned beer home, you must also have a discount. This is one of the reasons why I come here to help my refrigerator replenishment.

The business here is a well known place for craft beer, itâ€™s been in business for a long time. I have no complaints what so ever on Crafted, in fact they host a wide variety of craft beers around the world and it is great. But I do however am very disappointed with the Mexican vendor stationed outside of Crafted. I understand that different vendors comes and goes depending on how they cooperate their events with Crafted, but this Mexican vendor seems to be an exception because it seems to be operating there indefinitely. Is this even in compliance with Maji squareâ€™s regulations?Aside from that, the main reason for my disappointment is itâ€™s price which is 250nt for 3 Small tacos. Please reevaluate your pricing as it seems that first of all, you donâ€™t seem like a legitimate business and secondly youâ€™re not subjugated with insane monthly rental fees like all other vendors in Majisquare or other legitimate Mexican restaurants in Taipei city with sells tacos well under 250nt with a much better variety, volume and sanitary conditions.

Also, the burritos this Mexican vendor serves is an absolute joke. It shouldnâ€™t even be called a burrito as it just looks like a bigger taco with sprinkles of rice on it and a copious amount of hot sauce (if you wanted spicy).

I highly suspect that this Mexican vendor is just taking advantage of our local taiwanese citizens with limited experiences on Mexican cuisine.

I am very disappointed as this Mexican vendor used to serve one of the best tacos there is, but it just a scam to me now.
